entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 12:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
